casebody.data:
NIES
v.
TOWN OF EMERALD ISLE. No. 409PA15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 5, 2016. J. David Breemer, Sacramento, for Nies, Gregory P., et al. Keith P. Anthony, Durham, for Nies, Gregory P., et al. Brian E. Edes, Wilmington, for Town of Emerald Isle. Norwood P. Blanchard, III, for Town of Emerald Isle.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 4th of May 2016 by Plaintiffs:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of May 2016."

Plaintiffs shall have up to and including the 23rd day of May 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
